articles.author: Mithil Aggarwal
articles.title: The U.S. beat Pakistan in cricket in a historic upset. Will the sport finally go mainstream?
articles.description: The U.S. men’s national cricket team defeated Pakistan on Thursday in a historic upset in the T20 World Cup.
articles.content:
Cricket may have finally gotten its moment in the U.S.
The U.S. mens national cricket team delivered a stunning blow to heavyweight Pakistan in Texas on Thursday during a surprisingly close T20 Worl… [+2505 chars]

articles.title: T20 World Cup: USA cricket team shocks Pakistan in Texas
articles.description: Why the USA's shock victory over Pakistan in the men's T20 World Cup could be huge for the sport stateside.
articles.content:
For cricket to break America, it needed something special. 
It needed drama, entertainment, high-quality skill and a little bit of chaos thrown in. 
So when the co-hosts of the T20 World Cup stunne… [+2323 chars]

articles.title: USA beat Pakistan: T20 World Cup upset 'a big day for US cricket'
articles.description: USA cricket captain Monank Patel reacts to his side’s stunning super-over win against Pakistan in the T20 World Cup.
articles.content: 'Unbelievable win over Pakistan a big day for US cricket' Video, 00:00:45'Unbelievable win over Pakistan a big day for US cricket'

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
